rules_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature can’t block this turn.
Legacy {3}{R} [i](You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its legacy cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
special_text2:
